CustomField.formula: IF(ISNULL(SLA_Time_to_Complete__c), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0151B000002xQT9", "Pause"), IF(((SLA_Time_to_Complete__c - NOW()) * 24 * 60) / SLA_in_Minutes__c <= 0,IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0151B000002xQTB", "Red"), IF(((SLA_Time_to_Complete__c - NOW()) * 24 * 60) / SLA_in_Minutes__c > 0.50,IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0151B000002xQT8", "Green"), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0151B000002xQTA", "Yellow"))))
CustomField.label: SLA Color
